title: Bug 118780 - Expression builder shows old column names instead of aliases in data set
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, it shows the old column names instead of the aliases set for the columns in the data set.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. Notice that it displays the old column names instead of the aliases set for the columns.
